author: Eleanor Doughty
title: These are the anti-ageing serums that you need to buy
text: It is possible to feel bombarded by the amount of products in shops that claim to help you lessen the effects of ageing . Whether any of them work is something that you'll have to find out yourself, but if you're in the market for something a little bit special, then have we got a treat for you. You are probably aware of the serum , the little bottle of joy on your bathroom shelf. If not, you would be forgiven for not being quite sure what a serum does. It's a super-charged product, with tiny molecules that deposit ingredients deep down into the skin - all good news. Excitingly, some of the nicest ones are specially formulated to support anti-ageing . These are our favourites, hand-picked for you. 1. Origins Mixed up with sea haricots, trehalose and the rejuvenating rose of Jericho, Origins' Make a Difference serum leaves your skin feeling dewy, refreshed and healthy after use. Giving it a full flush of hydration and restoring smoothness, it's what your bathroom cabinet is waiting for. £36, harrods.com 2. Clinique They say that miracles can't happen, but Clinique's Smart Custom Serum might just break that rule. This serum is so clever that it understands your skin's past and is able to change its appearance in the future.# Don't ask us how, but it can. Addressing the appearance of uneven skin tone, lines and wrinkles while firming the skin and making it more radiant, this is a delicious serum that you skin will drink up. From £48, clinique.co.uk 3. Balance Me Balance Me's anti-ageing face serum does what it says on the bottle, and is 100 per cent natural. With its conditioning Abyssinian oil and hydrating pure grade hyalurionic acid, it firms, lifts and plumps skin, which is really, everything you're after, isn't it? £36, johnlewis.com 4. Merumaya Merumaya's Iconic Youth Serum is formed of ten evidence-based active ingredients, all designed to help prevent further ageing of skin, as far as possible. Working to boost radiance and luminosity, its job is to reduce the appearance of lines and wrinkles, and generally give your skin a good loving. Top notch. £35.50, johnlewis.com 5. Nuxe This creamy serum reduces brown spots and helps to re-pulp skin with its intense treatment. Offering your skin back some natural radiance, it fills in wrinkles, evens out your skin tones and makes you simply glow. Just perfection. £46, feelunique.com Read more • The very best day creams • Essential anti-ageing SPFs • Our favourite night creams • The best hand creams going telegraph.co.uk Follow @telegoodlife
